itemdesc-tentbag-empty: A completely empty tent bag, need to pack something into it.
itemdesc-tentbag-packed: A packed tent bag ready to go for your adventures!
tentbag-solid-ground: Cannot unpack here, need solid ground!
tentbag-clear-area: Cannot unpack here, need a clear area!
tentbag-unpack-error: Cannot unpack, internal error reading saved data!
